Package suncertify.presentation

Interface Summary
BookingController This interface is to be implemented by the controller class used in the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application.
BookingModel This interface is to be implemented by the model class used in the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application.
BookingView This interface is to be implemented by the view class used in the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application.
 

Class Summary
ApplicationRunner Depending on the command line argument used, it will launch the appropriate application mode.
BookingControllerImp This class implements the BookingController interface and therefore must implement the methods in this interface.
BookingMainFrame This class is responsible for launching the appropriate GUI depending on the application mode (ApplicationMode ENUM).
BookingModelImp This class implements the BookingModel and therefore must implement the methods in this interface.
BookingModelNwImp This class implements the BookingModel interface and is used to represent the BookingModelImp class on the server side.
BookingViewImp This class implements the BookingView and therefore must implement the methods in this interface.
SearchRecordsExactFilter This class is used to filter records for the GUI as it requires exact matches to the search criteria.
 

Enum Summary
ApplicationMode Specifies the modes the application can run in.
